description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Save the chick from being captured by various evil foes with the help of your friend, dodgyness and overall awesomeness! Play with up to one player!  Thumbs up if glorious game happy make!
